enum Navico::Image::tPPIRangeInterpolation

Different kinds of PPI range interpolation.

Enumerator
eRangeInterpolationNone 

No interpolation done.

eRangeInterpolationPeak 

peak preservation and possibility to use the range resolution

enum Navico::Image::tPPIAzimuthInterpolation

Different kinds of PPI azimuth interpolation.

Enumerator
eAzimuthInterpolationNone 

No azimuth interpolation.

eAzimuthInterpolationRepeat 

Repetition of the spoke in azimuth if azimuth hole is present.
